wikipedia_page.main: John David Jones (June 26, 1923 – October 7, 2014) was a Welsh-American politician in the state of Washington. He served in the Washington House of Representatives and Washington State Senate as a Republican.

response: *John D. Jones (1849–1914), speaker of the Minnesota House of Representatives
*John D. Jones (Washington politician) (born 1923), Welsh-American politician in the state of Washington
John D. Jones (1849–1914) was a Minnesota politician and Speaker of the Minnesota House of Representatives.
